Mobile App Design & Development

For your app to succeed, you need a smart business strategy, a killer UI/UX design,
and a talented mobile development team.

We are The Leading Passionate Creators of Future-Ready Mobile Workspace

Fboxer is the leading market leader in mobile application development, offering end-to-end mobility solutions, strategic technology consulting and business expertise.
We help our clients digitizing business operations in more innovative, effective and cost-efficient ways. With continued investment in quality and client satisfaction, Fboxer’ mission is to be “the trusted partner” for business leaders in mobility engagements for long term.
Our expertise lies in building lot, Android and iOS applications supported by a strong cloud based backend infrastructure.
Our Mobile App design and development Services

iPhone App Development

We have a highly skilled and experienced team for the design, development, testing and deployment of iPhone Apps.
We have excellent UX and UI designers, who design the user experience, user profiles, design flows and user stories.
Fboxer expertise and experience in iPhone application architecture, design and development, our company has a solid understanding of the Apple platform and the various components involved including:

iPhone (iOS) SDK | Cocoa Touch / Objective C / C++Programming tools: Xcode IDE, Interface Builder
SQLite Database | OpenGL ES, Open AL and Core Graphics
Core Audio | Core Animation | WebKit Programming
Accelerometer, GPS |Core Location Framework.

IPhone Apps development for various domains in the industry

  • E-commerce and Shopping Apps | Retail and Fashion Apps | Education Apps
  • Social Networking and Social Media Apps |Travel Apps| Food and Restaurant Apps
  • Book Apps | Health, Fitness and Lifestyle Apps |Real Estate Apps | Home Automation Apps
  • Music Apps, Multimedia Apps

Android App Development

We have the most experienced Android developers for the design, development, testing and deployment of Android Apps .

We have expertise in Android Software Development Kit (SDK), Android Media APIs, Location–based Service APIs, Wi–Fi APIs, Android Security Architecture, OpenGL, 3D graphics, and other technologies required to build the most innovative Android apps.

C++ and NDK | Cloud integration | Robust and flexible build system | Develop for all Android devices | Testing tools & frameworks | Library modules | Google App Engine modules

Android App Development for various domains in the industry

E-commerce and Shopping Apps | Retail and Fashion Apps | Education Apps
Social Networking and Social Media Apps |Travel Apps| Food and Restaurant Apps
Book Apps | Health, Fitness and Lifestyle Apps |Real Estate Apps | Home Automation Apps
Music Apps, Multimedia Apps
